Title: Relates to restrictions and penalties for certain transactions involving used catalytic converters
Summary: Relates to restrictions and penalties for certain transactions involving used catalytic converters; establishes penalties for possessing, selling or buying a catalytic converter without a permit or proper documentation; defines terms.
LawCode: Add ยง415-d, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to restrictions and penalties for certain transactions involving used catalytic converters
